attributes.action: Activate a State funeral for the last suviving soldier of the WW1
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A state funeral for the last serviving
Soldier of th first world war ? to honour All those that gave thier lives and fought on our behalf. As it is surely deserved ,What Greater honour can we give them???

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
